data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance to basic industrial infrastructure (Water, Gas and Approach Road) - SC/ST - Existing
data.benefits: The Scheme offers support for 75% of the cost of infrastructure investments or expenses for water/gas utilities, up to a total of Rs. 15 lakhs for all infrastructure facilities.
data.eligibility: All industries which have done fixed capital investment on Water, Gas or Approach Road in other than Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation (GIDC) area/ industrial park.
data.conditions:
1. The investment component of this project will not be eligible for assistance, if the said component has already been sanctioned under any other scheme of the state government, unless specified otherwise.
  2. If assistance is already availed under Central Government Scheme, the assistance together of state government and central government scheme should not exceed the eligible investment component cost.
  3. The expenditure incurred for construction of approach road from the premises of the enterprise to the main outer point/connecting point for last mile connectivity will be eligible
  4. The expenditure for construction of approach road will be considered on the basis of System of Record (SOR) applicable
  5. The construction of approach road should be certified for quality by third party holding Government approval.
data.beneficiaries: All industries which have done fixed capital investment on Water, Gas or Approach Road in other than Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation (GIDC) area/ industrial park.
data.prerequisites:
1. The investment component of this project will not be eligible for assistance, if the said component has already been sanctioned under any other scheme of the state government, unless specified otherwise.
  2. If assistance is already availed under Central Government Scheme, the assistance together of state government and central government scheme should not exceed the eligible investment component cost.
  3. The expenditure incurred for construction of approach road from the premises of the enterprise to the main outer point/connecting point for last mile connectivity will be eligible
  4. The expenditure for construction of approach road will be considered on the basis of System of Record (SOR) applicable
  5. The construction of approach road should be certified for quality by third party holding Government approval.
data.context:
The Industrial Policy 2020 envisions Gujarat as a global business destination for next-generation sustainable manufacturing and service industry that stimulates sustainable development, inclusive and a balanced regional growth.

 The primary mission of the Industrial Policy includes support for development of MSMEs, focus on Export Competitiveness : Vocal for Local to become Global and thus strengthen integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To provide financial assistance on the basis of capital investment done for infrastructure required for gas/water facilities.
data.description: Assistance of 75% of cost of capital investment for infrastructure or expenditure incurred for water/gas facilities, maximum up to Rs. 15 lakhs including all infrastructure facilities.
data.how_to_apply: Applicant can directly apply to Industries Commissioner along with detailed estimate for the basic infrastructural/facilities needed.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be released after the approval by Industries Commissioner.
data.additional_info: The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail asssistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
2. Copy of the Constitution of the enterprise (MOA or AOA) 
3. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory 
5. CA certificate for fixed capital investment 
6. Copy of Gujarat Pollution Control Board approved NOC/Consent & other departments approval (if applicable) 
7. Copy of GST Registration (if applicable) 
8. Copy of GST return of previous financial year (if applicable) 
9. Copy of ITR of the last financial year (if applicable) 
10. Self-Attested documents/ details to be submitted by the Authorized Person 
11. Power of attorney/Board resolution/ Consent letter 
12. Supporting Documents for SC/ST Enterprise
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:
Industries Commissionerate (MSME Incentive),
4th Floor, Block No. 1, Udyog Bhavan, Sector 11, 
Gandhinagar-382010
